description.narrative:
E-motive´s core mission is to support Citizens & Social Entrepreneurs who offer innovative local solutions to global social challenges. Until now E-Motive has been centered in face to face exchanges of innovative solutions between South and North, whereas the need of Going Global is to:
•Further support citizen and expert access, and real involvement around innovative solutions •Make innovative ideas available (and alive) digitally •Pilot test cases for external funding (clearly demonstrate the potential of the Going Global concept as a promotional feature). Create a new model for fruitfull multiple learning for NGO's and civil society worldwide
Based on E-Motive Expert Meeting in 2014 (facilitated by Somos Más), the current E-Motive transition is thought in terms of conceiving itself as a ‘service network’ (a network where the services of their members complement, integrate, and add value) and eliminatingthe differences between North and South.
The work with the pilots serve as a first step towards the creation of a network where partners can share, exchange and develop globally innovative solutions through, for example:
?Matchmaking of unexpected new connections to stimulate multiple learning
?Creating face-to-face meetings with a diverse group of stakeholders from diverse countries around the same theme
?Requesting a trajectory for testing of solutions in different contexts
?Asking for support on tools for crowd funding (later on)
?Organizing E-Motive network events in order to find new investors and stakeholders
Somos Mas, an organization that goes beyond the South-North perspective by having expanded from Colombia to Europe and working across cultures, proposes to develop and manage the Going Global digital community platform, based on an active observation and support to the Going Global pilot partners, 3 ongoing sets of initiatives (deepening democracy, food quality, artivism) and to expand the outreach of their exchanges of innovative ideas. With this, the Going Global platform and community is intended to be kickstarted unto a new phase.
High value is created through the development of the technical components for the services of the global platform, and also through the management of regular communication among task team, pilots, head of other ON initiatives and partners, to ensure everybody is onboardand working in the same direction towards the creation of the next level of Emotive platform, and seeking the new financing to continue scaling the project.

participating-org.narrative: Somos Más is an award winning organization that has been focusing for over 12 years in taking forward this vision over the social sector, in order to achieve a more powerful and networked organizations and civil society bringing higher impact and participation. Whatsmore, Somos Mas embodies the knowledge sharing and evolution beyond South and North, being an organization that was born in Colombia and expanded to Europe. Somos Mas also believes in the transition of working from centralized to distributed networks.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
